page.title: 07Industry
page.content: Hughenden Valley provides building, heating,kitchen & bathroom installation and woodwork display services.Downley has a structural steel workshop,a garden landscaping service and a smithy open occasionally for shoeing horses. Once this area was famous for the making of chair legs on a pole-lathe in the beech woods.Now Mines & West Ltd.of Downley continue the furniture making tradition.Much of their production is of fitted office units,also used at airports and on ships.Materials used are laminates,wood veneers,plastics and steel and aluminium castings. Prestigious chairs are made here in Hepplewhite,Sheraton or Chippendale designs.Skilled craftsmen hand carve these for use in Board Rooms of banks or for sale in London in Harrods and Liberty's.Many are commissioned for rich customers from the Middle East.
